Package com.artattack

Class FileDiv

java.lang.Object
com.artattack.FileDiv
public class FileDiv
extends java.lang.Object
This class define the behavior of a general file division routine
By default this class divide the file in even parts of 4Kb each, otherwise the part size can be specified
The splitmode property determine the usage of the class, if set to true the file passed to the constructor is the one who will be split, if set to false the file will be the first generated from the split routine (Ex : file0.frame.txt )

  • Field Summary

    protected java.lang.String filename
    if splitmode is true it represents the file to be split, if false it is the first file generated from the DivideFile operation
    protected boolean splitmode
    splitmode determine the usage of the class, if set to true the DivideFile method can be triggered otherwise the MergeFile method can be triggered
    protected boolean zipped

  • Constructor Details

    • FileDiv

      public FileDiv​(java.lang.String fname, boolean mode)
      The default BufferSize is 4096 (4Kb)
      Parameters:
      fname - The file name
      mode - Set to true for split-mode or false for merge-mode

    • FileDiv

      public FileDiv​(java.lang.String fname, boolean mode, int buffersize)

    • FileDiv

      public FileDiv​(java.lang.String fname, boolean mode, boolean crypt, boolean zip, int buffersize)

  • Method Details

    • DivideFile

      public long DivideFile()
      Divide the file in even parts based on BufferSize
      Use the readWrite method to write
      Returns:
      The number of parts, -1 if the operation fails 0 if the splitmode is false

    • MergeFile

      public int MergeFile() throws java.io.IOException
      Take the first file generated from the previous DivideFile operation and merge all the parts
      By default this method doesn't delete the parts
      Returns:
      1 if the operation worked, 0 otherwise
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - The exception is thrown by the FileNotFoundException catch if the file passed to the constructor does not exists, otherwise the FileNotFoundException return 1 to the function

    • readWrite

      protected void readWrite​(java.io.RandomAccessFile source, java.io.BufferedOutputStream dest, long numBytes) throws java.io.IOException
      This method read from source numBytes bytes and write to dest
      Parameters:
      source - Source stream, in this class is a RandomAccessFile by default
      dest - Destination stream
      numBytes - The number of file read and written
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Not handled
      See Also:
      RandomAccesFile.read()

    • getFilePlainName

      protected java.lang.String getFilePlainName​(java.lang.String filename)
      Extract the name of the file from the full name, if this is used in merge-mode remove the ".frame" from the file name
      Parameters:
      filename - filename
      Returns:
      Ex : file1.txt ---> file1 or if splitmode = false file0.frame.txt ---> file0

    • getFileExt

      protected java.lang.String getFileExt​(java.lang.String filename)
      Extract the extension from the file name
      Parameters:
      filename - filename
      Returns:
      Ex : file1.txt ----> .txt

    • generateOutputFilename

      protected java.lang.String generateOutputFilename​(long index)
      This method generate the name of the part's file based on the encrypted and zipped values and the index of the part
      The constant ".frame" is used to define the used division routine
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the file part
      Returns:
      The file part name
